description:
Located in Glenwood Springs, Colorado, Doehling Law Accident & Injury Law, P.C., has become one of the most prominent and successful personal injury law firms on the Western Slope. With more than 60 years of combined legal experience, our lawyers have the extensive skills and resources necessary to handle your matter efficiently, and we have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation to date for our plaintiff clients suffering needlessly as the result of someone else's negligence.

This level of success did not happen by accident. It is the direct result of our unwavering commitment at helping our clients find the justice they deserve, and you can trust that we will do all we can to help you obtain the favorable outcomes you seek for your unfortunate legal challenge as efficiently as possible.

Over the course of our history, our law firm has handled all types of personal injury and wrongful death claims, including those arising from motor vehicle accidents, unsafe property conditions, skiing accidents, animal attacks and more. In addition, our lawyers have previously worked at insurance companies, so we have a great deal of insight and knowledge into the inner workings of the industry and the loopholes so many insurance providers use to reduce or deny claims.

This means you can expect to receive the highest level of representation and support for your legal matter, and you can contact Doehling Law Accident & Injury Law, P.C., to take advantage of our law firm's free initial consultation. We have five offices across our region, so you are never far away from the quality legal counsel you need, and we offer virtual consultations to help keep you safe and healthy in these uncertain times.
